primevc.gui.styling.UIElementStyle

type
class
implements
IUIElementStyle
subclasses
primevc.gui.styling.ApplicationStyle
UIElementStyle contains all style objects that are used by one IUIElement. It's a unique collection of id-selectors, styleName-selectors and element-selectors. The UIElementStyle of an element has to be rebuild everytime the element is changing of parent.

Constructor

new(target : primevc.gui.traits.IStylable)

Instance Variables

boxFilters(getBoxFilters,null) : FiltersCollection

childrenChanged(default,null) : primevc.core.dispatcher.Signal0

Current css-states of the object.

effects(getEffects,null) : EffectsCollection

filledProperties(default,null) : Int

Bitflag-collection with all properties that are set in the styles of the target,

font(getFont,null) : TextStyleCollection

graphics(getGraphics,null) : GraphicsCollection

Proxy object to loop through all available states in this object.

object on which the style applies

Instance Methods

addStyle(style : StyleBlock) : Int

broadcastChanges(?changedProperties : Int) : Int

Method to loop through all available style objects to find all the properties that are set for the target.

createState() : StyleState

dispose() : Void

findStyle(name : String, type : StyleBlockType, ?exclude : StyleBlock) : StyleBlock

getUsablePropertiesOf(styleCell : primevc.core.collections.FastDoubleCell_primevc_gui_styling_StyleBlock, ?properties : Int) : Int

Method returns all the properties that are defined in the given cell-style and which are not defined in the styles with higher priority.

invalidateCall(changes : Int, sender : primevc.core.traits.IInvalidatable) : Void

iterator() : Iterator<StyleBlock>

removeStyleCell(styleCell : primevc.core.collections.FastDoubleCell_primevc_gui_styling_StyleBlock, ?isStyleStillInList : Bool) : Int

parameters
isStyleStillInList flag indicating if the style is still in the styles list. This is not the case when the styles are resetted since the whole list is thrown away.
Method will remove the given stylecell from the the list with styles. This includes removing the change-listeners. It will return a flag with style-properties that are changed after removing the style.

updateStyles(?allowBroadcast : Bool) : Int

Method will fill the styles-list for this object and enable the style-change listeners.
